# `hui-deploy`

> 统一框架 2.0 部署模块

## Usage

```
const { genSeePackage } = require("hui-deploy");

genSeePackage("hui-1.2.17", {
  system: "hui",
  type: "bizframe",
  name: "hui-pro",
  version: "1.2.17"
});

genSeePackage("hui-demo-1.0.1", {
  system: "hui",
  type: "subsystem",
  name: "demo",
  version: "1.0.1"
});
```
